name: cheekily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is slightly rude or shows a lack of respect, but may be funny: “Looking for us?” she asked cheekily. He grinned cheekily at her. See
cheeky
More examplesFewer examplesThey cheekily call their music "Upper West Side Soweto".Our waiter suggested rather cheekily that the dish was sufficiently large to share.The boy cheekily stuck out his tongue as visitors arrived.He was trying not to laugh as I walked up to him and he cheekily slipped his robe off.
